body_html:
Hi I also try to use torch.eig() to compute the eigenvalues and eigenvectors that I want to use in a custom forward layer. In pytorch version 0.3 i get None in the derivative values when I print them and in pytorch version 0.4 i get this ( RuntimeError: the derivative for 'eig' is not implemented).

Can someone help me plz ? :P
Thanks in advance.

body:
Hi I also try to use torch.eig() to compute the eigenvalues and eigenvectors that I want to use in a custom forward layer. In pytorch version 0.3 i get None in the derivative values when I print them and in pytorch version 0.4  i get this ( RuntimeError: the derivative for 'eig' is not implemented).

Can someone help me plz ? :P 
Thanks in advance.
